nodes.text: Sail Barge Blues was a song. During the war between the First Order and the Resistance, a notice in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu advertised an upcoming performance of the song by the Yuzzum musician Joh Yowza, in a rare solo performance by the artist.
Sail Barge Blues was first mentioned in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019.
